titles: The Roundheads, or, The good old cause a comedy as it is acted at His Royal Highness the Dukes Theatre / by Mrs. A. Behn.
author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.
Tatham, John, fl. 1632-1664. Rump.
publisher: Printed for D. Brown ... and H. Rhodes ...,
notes: "Great part, both of the plot and language of this play, is borrowed from Tatham's comedy called, The Rump"-- Baker, D.E. Biog. dram.
